name: Amberial (2007)
description:
Roll and bounce in this mystical cave across 15 levels filled with contraptions and challenging platforming.

I originally made this in 2007. I've now repackaged it as a Desktop game so it's still accessible. Move with the arrow keys.

I am currently working on a complete remake of the concept which you can see at:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/917140/Amberial_Dreams/
